ygData.subject: Re: Staff Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been using a 2-handed staff since I got lucky killing Flippy the gnoll. Haven t gone back. Honestly, if I HAVE to go into combat, I wanna do dmg. It s
ygData.messageBody:
I've been using a 2-handed staff since I got lucky killing Flippy the gnoll.
Haven't gone back.
Honestly, if I HAVE to go into combat, I wanna do dmg. It's usually landing
that killing blow
while the stupid thing is running away. Do more damage and you'll run a lot
less.

Zalbar
14th Wizard
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
To: EverQuest Mailing List <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: 16 avril, 1999 18:46
Subject: [eq_wizards] Staff Question


>From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
>
>As a relatively low level wizard, I have found both a one handed
>staff and a two handed staff. Which skill should I be working on
>for when I'm a higher level and can get a magic staff? Are magic
>staffs mainly 1 handed or 2 handed? Either? Any suggestions?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Soren
